articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: NY schools told to stop using Native American mascots - ABC News
articles.description: Schools in New York state are under orders to stop using Native American references in mascots, team names and logos by the end of the current school year
articles.content: ALBANY, N.Y. -- Schools in New York state must stop using Native American references in mascots, team names and logos by the end of the current school year or face penalties including a loss of state… [+1947 chars]

articles.author: Leah Fleming
articles.title: From Miss Georgia to Miss America, beauty comes in many shades. Two winners want to pass the word on - GPB News
articles.description: Beauty comes in many shades, shapes, sizes and abilities.  That's the message two Miss Georgia beauty queens want to pass on.
articles.content: The first people to ever appear on stage at a Miss America pageant were Black dancers in 1923 who masqueraded as enslaved Africans for a musical number. It was not until 1970 that a Black woman, Iowa… [+6427 chars]
